actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

official_title: To require assurances that certain family planning service projects and programs will provide pamphlets containing the contact information of adoption centers.

summary.text: Adoption Information Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to require family planning service projects or programs, as a condition of receiving certain grants or contracts, to assure the Secretary of Health and Human Services that they will provide each person who inquires about their services with a pamphlet containing a comprehensive list of adoption centers in their state. Directs the Secretary to prepare, annually update, and distribute such pamphlets to such projects or programs.

titles.title: To require assurances that certain family planning service projects and programs will provide pamphlets containing the contact information of adoption centers.
